item.title: Rosewitha add a quote by Paulo Coelho
item.description: "And, when you want something, all the universe conspires in helping you to achieve it." -- Paulo Coelho

item.title: Rosewitha add a quote by William Shakespeare
Rosewitha add a quote by Khalil Gibran
item.description: "Your clothes conceal much of your beauty, yet they hide not the unbeautiful." -- Khalil Gibran

item.title: Rosewitha add a quote by Lewis Carroll
item.description: "Begin at the beginning," the King said, very gravely, "and go on till you come to the end: then stop." -- Lewis Carroll

item.title: Rosewitha add a quote by Christopher Paolini
item.description: "Live in the present, remember the past, and fear not the future, for it doesn't exist and never shall. There is only now." -- Christopher Paolini

item.title: Rosewitha add a quote by Viktor Shklovsky
item.description:
"You have to store up books, becoming acquainted with human experience; let them lie around your thoughts, becoming yoursâ€”ring upon ring, as a tree grows, let them rise up from the depths like coral islands.
If it gets crowded with all the books and there's nowhere to put your bed, it's better to exchange it for a folding bed" -- Viktor Shklovsky

item.title: Rosewitha add a quote by Sapardi Djoko Damono
